author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 22nd edition of the International Yoga Festival came to a close on Thursday, with winners being announced for the different categories.

Priyadarshini from Karur, Tamil Nadu, won the overall championship in the female category, while Nandakumar from Cuddalore, Nadu won the overall championship in the male category. The festival is organised annually by the Department of Tourism. Apart from competitions, the festival also included workshops on various topics like World Peace through Yoga, yoga for school children and management of arthritis or back pain were conducted at Gandhi Thidal. Yoga enthusiasts from Germany, Spain, Italy and Hong Kong were part of this festival.
title: Girl from Karur bags title at yoga festival
